pages.title: Southern Sunfish
pages.text: It is closely related to its congener, the more widely known Mola mola, and is found in the Southern Hemisphere.

pages.title: Southern Sunfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
